Title: Object: Admiral S.r Horatio Nelson K.B. giving the command of his ship the Vanguard to Cap.n Berry
Description: Nelson shown full-length standing on the deck of the Vanguard, with a bandaged head and his right arm at his breast, supported by an officer and resting his sword on the floor while he looks to right at Captain Berry, who approaches with sword and hat in hand, and to whom Nelson resigns his command; other men behind working guns and rigging, and launching a volley of musket-fire; the Orient exploding in the background. 1798 Hand-coloured mezzotint
Bibliographic references: Chaloner Smith 1883 / British Mezzotinto portraits from the introduction of the art to the early part of the present century (undescribed)
Russell 1926 / English Mezzotint Portraits and their states: Catalogue of Corrections of and Additions to Chaloner Smith's "British Mezzotinto Portraits" (undescribed)
Associated names: Representation of: Horatio Nelson, 1st Baron and Viscount Nelson
Associated events: Associated Event: Battle of the Nile 3 August 1798
Funder name: With contribution from: National Heritage Memorial Fund
